articles.title: Why US Carmaker Ford Motor Is Shutting Manufacturing Plants In India - NDTV Profit
articles.description: After operating for 25 years in India, American auto major Ford Motor Co has decided to pull the plug on local manufacturing. The US automaker said that it would "take a hit of about $2 billion as it does not see a path to profitability in India."
articles.content:
Ford is the fifth automaker which has announced to stop manufacturing in India.
